name: The Neuron Healer
description:
Your Goal

Reconnect all neurons together by defeating all enemies in each neuron to light it up and restore the connections by traveling through them.

Controls

- A/D to strafe left/right

- W/S to move forward/backward

- Q/E to roll left/right

- Space/Ctrl to move up/down

- Left mouse button to fire

- Escape to return to title screen

How To Install

- Unzip it

- Launch "The Neruon Healer.exe"

- Enjoy it

- Leave comment for the mental of the developper :D

Missing Features (but will be fixed after GameJam)

- Their is no sound yet

- When all enemies of the level are defeated, their is no win screen

- You cannot lose (but this is a secret)
